subject: Skiing
Sports Injuries
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn injured her right knee again while training this month when she hit a compression turn made more difficult by a shadow that obscured the curve at Copper Mountain, Colo.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn injured her right knee again while training this month when she hit a compression turn made more difficult by a shadow that obscured the curve at Copper Mountain, Colo.
